org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Class OptorSimParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.OptorSimParameters

  • public class OptorSimParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds information on the various parameters that can be varied in the simulation. These are read in from a file specified on the command line.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static OptorSimParameters getInstance()
        Returns the single instance of the OptorSimParameters object, creating it if it has not already been instantiated.
        Returns:
        The OptorSimParameters instance.

      • setFilename

        public static void setFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Sets the name of the OptorSim parameters file. This is called by OptorSimMain using the filename specified in the command line, or if none was specified, the default of examples/parameters.conf is used.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the parameters file.

      • getGridConfigfile

        public java.lang.String getGridConfigfile()
        Gets the grid configuration file name.

        public java.lang.String getJobConfigFile()
        Gets the job configuration file name.

        public java.lang.String getBandwidthConfigFile()
        Gets the bandwidth configuration file name.

      • getNoOfJobs

        public int getNoOfJobs()
        Gets the number of jobs to be submitted.

      • getScheduler

        public int getScheduler()
        Gets the job scheduler to use.

      • getUsers

        public int getUsers()
        Gets the type of grid user which will submit jobs. Basically this is the job submission pattern.

      • getOptimiser

        public int getOptimiser()
        Gets the replica optimiser to use.

      • getDt

        public long getDt()
        Gets the time interval to use for the access histories.

      • getAccessPatternGenerator

        public int getAccessPatternGenerator()
        Gets the kind of file access pattern to use.

      • getShape

        public double getShape()
        Gets the shape factor to use for the Zipf distribution.

      • getComputingElement

        public int getComputingElement()
        Gets the type of CE

      • getFileDistribution

        public java.lang.String[] getFileDistribution()
        Gets the initial distribution of master files.

      • fillAllSites

        public boolean fillAllSites()
        Checks whether all sites should be filled with files at the start or not.

      • getJobDelay

        public int getJobDelay()
        Gets the delay between job submissions.

      • useRandomSeed

        public boolean useRandomSeed()
        Checks whether or not to use a fixed random seed.
        Returns:
        true if a random seed should be used, false if a fixed seed should be used.

      • getMaxQueueSize

        public int getMaxQueueSize()
        Gets the maximum queue length for a ComputingElement.

      • getProcessTime

        public int getProcessTime()
        Gets the file processing time.

      • auctionOn

        public boolean auctionOn()
        Checks whether or not to use auctions.

      • getInitialHopCount

        public int getInitialHopCount()
        Gets the number of hops a message should travel on the P2P system.

      • getInitialTimeout

        public long getInitialTimeout()
        Gets the timeout value for parent auctions. Nested auctions will have their timeout reduced by the Timeout Reduction Factor.

      • getTimeoutReductionFactor

        public double getTimeoutReductionFactor()
        Gets the Timeout Reduction Factor for nested auctions. That is, the factor by which the timeout for parent auctions should be reduced, so that nested auctions finish before the parent auctions.

      • useAuctionDebugger

        public boolean useAuctionDebugger()
        Check whether or not to output auction log information.

      • useBackgroundBandwidth

        public boolean useBackgroundBandwidth()
        Check whether or not to use background traffic on the network.

      • getDefaultBackground

        public java.lang.String getDefaultBackground()
        Gets the default background bandwidth file to use when none other is available.

      • getDataDirectory

        public java.lang.String getDataDirectory()
        Gets the directory in which background bandwidth data files are kept.

      • startTimeOfDay

        public float startTimeOfDay()
        Gets the time of day at which simulation time should start. Should be on the hour or half hour.

      • useGui

        public boolean useGui()
        Check whether or not to use the GUI

      • outputStatistics

        public int outputStatistics()
        Gets the level of statistics output required. Default is 3, i.e. full statistics output.

      • advanceTime

        public boolean advanceTime()
        Check whether to use real time or event driven time model.
